snippet: California Chrome, the winner of the Kentucky Derby and the 3-5 favorite to win the Preakness Stakes on Saturday, was deemed to be fine despite coughing after his morning gallop.
abstract: California Chrome, Kentucky Derby winner and 3-5 favorite in the Preakness Stakes, is deemed to be fine despite coughing after his morning gallop; is being treated for small blister on his throat.
lead_paragraph: California Chrome, the winner of the Kentucky Derby and the 3-5 favorite to win the Preakness Stakes on Saturday, was deemed to be fine despite coughing after his morning gallop.

headline.main: California Chrome Coughs, but Trainers Say He Is Fine
headline.print_headline: California Chrome Coughs, but Trainers Say He Is Fine
